CDSCurrentDate: CY-The date of your confirmation statement is:
CDSCurrentDateExplainer: CY-This date is 12 months after the last confirmation statement, or 12 months after the limited partnership's registration date.
CDSDateChangeExplainer: CY-You can change the date of the confirmation statement if you want to file early. This will start a new 12 month review period, and change the date of future confirmation statements.
CDSRadioButtonError: CY-Error: Please select yes or no
CDSDateValueMissingError: CY-Error: Please enter the confirmation statement date
CDSDateValueInvalidError: CY-Error: The confirmation statement date is invalid
CDSRadioButtonQuestion: CY-Do you want to change the date of your confirmation statement?
CDSRadioButtonYesExplainer: CY-Enter the date of your confirmation statement
